entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 14.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 21.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm. High 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing late this evening. Low 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
